com.github.glusk2.sprouts.core.ui

Class ResetDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.InputListener
      • com.github.glusk2.sprouts.core.ui.ResetDialog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener

    public final class ResetDialog
extends InputListener
    A "New game" button's InputListener.

    A ResetDialog is shown on click, enabling any player to start a new game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ResetDialog(Game game, ShapeRenderer renderer, float minDimensionRatio, Stage stage, Slider slider)
      Creates a "New game" button InputListener.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ResetDialog

        public ResetDialog(Game game,
                   ShapeRenderer renderer,
                   float minDimensionRatio,
                   Stage stage,
                   Slider slider)
        Creates a "New game" button InputListener.
        Parameters:
        game - the Game to show the new Screen to once the reset is confirmed
        renderer - the ShapeRenderer to use in the new Screen after the reset
        minDimensionRatio - Minimum dimension ratio. This is used to compute the move thickness. The minimum game board dimension is divided by this value to produce the move thickness.
        stage - the stage to "pin" the "reset game" Dialog to
        slider - the slider to pick the number of sprouts for the new game with
